title: The Apple Watch Series 3 might not get watchOS 9 despite still being on sale
content:
The Cupertino tech giant released the Apple Watch Series 3 back in September 2017. Almost five years later, the company is still selling this wearable, despite its outdated internals. This becomes especially problematic when users update to the latest watchOS 8. Considering the operating system is designed for newer watches with faster processors and larger

The post The Apple Watch Series 3 might not get watchOS 9 despite still being on sale appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Apple Watch Series 3 could be discontinued later this year. It might not receive the watchOS 9 software update either.
